Core Platform Features

Built with cutting-edge technology to provide the best copy trading experience

Automated Trade Copying

Automatically replicate trades from verified professional traders in real-time. Set your allocation strategy and let the platform handle execution.

Discover Top Traders

Browse and follow verified trading professionals. Filter by performance metrics, risk level, trading style, and asset classes.

Advanced Risk Management

Set stop-loss, take-profit, and position sizing rules. Protect your capital with customizable risk controls and portfolio limits.

Track performance with detailed analytics dashboards. Monitor ROI, win rate, Sharpe ratio, and drawdown metrics in real-time.

Powerful Tools for Every Investor

Everything you need to manage your copy trading portfolio effectively

Secure Brokerage Integration

Connect your existing brokerage account securely through SnapTrade. We never store your credentials or have direct access to your funds.

Flexible Allocation Strategies

Choose between fixed amount, percentage of portfolio, or percentage of leader's position. Customize allocation per leader.

Performance Tracking

Detailed trade history, P&L tracking, and performance attribution. Understand exactly which strategies are working.

Multi-Asset Support

Copy trades across stocks, ETFs, options, and cryptocurrencies. Diversify across multiple asset classes automatically.

Smart Notifications

Get alerted when leaders execute trades, hit performance milestones, or when your copy settings need attention.

Granular Controls

Filter which asset classes to copy, set maximum position sizes, and configure risk parameters for each leader you follow.
